languages.text: "Пусть оно умрет чисто. Нечистым ксеносам недоступна Его благодать, но... То, как он умеет глядеть в глаза гибели, достойно почтения".
"Let its death be clean. No xenos could ever hope to receive His grace, but... The way it gazes into the face of its doom is worthy of respect."
languages.original_text: "Пусть оно умрет чисто. Нечистым ксеносам недоступна Его благодать, но... То, как он умеет глядеть в глаза гибели, достойно почтения".

languages.text: «Que su muerte sea limpia. Ningún xenos puede recibir Su gracia, pero... La forma en la que contempla su fin es digna de respeto».
languages.original_text: "Let its death be clean. No xenos could ever hope to receive His grace, but... The way it gazes into the face of its doom is worthy of respect."

traits.locale_text: «Que su muerte sea limpia. Ningún xenos puede recibir Su gracia, pero... La forma en la que contempla su fin es digna de respeto».

languages.text: 「その死を清らかなものに。どんな異種族も主の恩寵を受けることは望めませんが…運命を見つめる姿は尊敬に値します」
languages.original_text: "Let its death be clean. No xenos could ever hope to receive His grace, but... The way it gazes into the face of its doom is worthy of respect."

traits.locale_text: 「その死を清らかなものに。どんな異種族も主の恩寵を受けることは望めませんが…運命を見つめる姿は尊敬に値します」

languages.text: “让它赶紧利落地死去吧。尽管异形不配得到不死之神的恩典，但……它面对死亡时的态度值得尊敬。”
languages.original_text: "Let its death be clean. No xenos could ever hope to receive His grace, but... The way it gazes into the face of its doom is worthy of respect."

traits.locale_text: “让它赶紧利落地死去吧。尽管异形不配得到不死之神的恩典，但……它面对死亡时的态度值得尊敬。”

languages.text: "Sein Tod soll sauber sein. Kein Xenos darf je auf Seine Gunst hoffen, aber ... dieser Blick ins Antlitz des Untergangs verdient Respekt."
languages.original_text: "Let its death be clean. No xenos could ever hope to receive His grace, but... The way it gazes into the face of its doom is worthy of respect."

traits.locale_text: "Sein Tod soll sauber sein. Kein Xenos darf je auf Seine Gunst hoffen, aber ... dieser Blick ins Antlitz des Untergangs verdient Respekt."

languages.text: « Que sa fin soit propre et digne. Aucun xénos ne peut espérer recevoir Sa grâce, mais... la bravoure avec laquelle ce monstre affronte sa propre mort mérite notre respect. »
languages.original_text: "Let its death be clean. No xenos could ever hope to receive His grace, but... The way it gazes into the face of its doom is worthy of respect."

traits.locale_text: « Que sa fin soit propre et digne. Aucun xénos ne peut espérer recevoir Sa grâce, mais... la bravoure avec laquelle ce monstre affronte sa propre mort mérite notre respect. »

languages.text: "Temiz bir ölüm bahşedelim. Hiçbir zeno, O'nun lütfunu almayı hayal dahi edemese de... Nihayetine bakış şekli, hürmeti hak ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Let its death be clean. No xenos could ever hope to receive His grace, but... The way it gazes into the face of its doom is worthy of respect."
